channel.title: focus on The views expressed
channel.description: Recent content in focus on The views expressed

item.title: Now
item.description: SARS CoV-2/COVID-19 status—fully vaccinated Pfizer-BioNTech I am … in the greater Seattle area until early June … grateful for the change in pace and focus brought on by pandemic isolation my wife and our relationship … dreaming of the end of the pandemic and the life beyond finding a new cadence that includes more than my pod people … reading The Hungry Brain by Stephan Guyenet; Flatiron Books, 2017 Fortuna by Kristyn Merbeth; Hachette Book Group, 2019 This is a Now page.

item.title: 20,000 feet
